name: invoiceDate
description: The date when the invoice was issued.

name: dueDate
description: The date when payment of the invoice is due

name: purchaseOrderNumber
description: The purchase order number for the invoice.

name: invoiceNumber
description: The invoice number for the invoice.

name: paymentMemo
description: The payment memo, description or details of the invoice.

children.name: name
children.description: The name of the business issuing the invoice.

children.name: email
children.description: The email address of the business.

children.name: email
children.description: The email address of the customer.

children.name: subtotal
children.description: The subtotal amount for the invoice.

children.name: taxAmount
children.description: The tax amount for the invoice.

children.name: taxPercentage
children.description: The tax percentage for the invoice.

children.name: unitPrice
children.description: The unit price of the item.

children.name: total
children.description: The total amount of the item.
